# Parallax Docs for LLMs

Parallax is an orchestration layer for AI agents. It coordinates multiple agents/models, applies consensus and quality gates, and produces confidence-scored results. Patterns are defined in YAML or via the visual Pattern Builder.

Start here:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/intro
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/getting-started/quickstart
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/concepts/patterns
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/sdk/overview
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/pattern-builder/overview

Key concepts:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/concepts/agents
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/concepts/patterns
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/concepts/consensus
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/concepts/confidence-scoring

Architecture:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/architecture/overview
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/architecture/org-chart-flow
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/architecture/data-plane
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/architecture/agent-lifecycle
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/architecture/workspace-service

Patterns & examples:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/patterns/overview
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/patterns/org-chart-patterns
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/patterns/voting-patterns
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/patterns/advanced-composition

Runtimes:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/agent-runtimes/overview
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/agent-runtimes/local
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/agent-runtimes/docker
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/agent-runtimes/kubernetes

Prism DSL:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/prism/overview
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/prism/syntax
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/prism/compilation

Enterprise:
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/enterprise/overview
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/enterprise/high-availability
- https://docs.parallaxai.dev/docs/enterprise/security

Full index: https://docs.parallaxai.dev/llms-full.txt
